Rose Gold Plated

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*

- Customer Reviews: 4.6 4.6 out of 5 stars 69 ratings.

banner_details:
This elegant jewelry banner features a soft pink diagonal gradient background with delicate accent shapes, creating a refined and feminine tone. The focal point is the product image ("product_image") of a rose gold-plated earring pair, placed to the right. The top portion highlights a bold marketing message with two stacked text layers ("heading_1" and "heading_2") in a deep mauve color, drawing attention. Just below, a sophisticated serif typeface tagline ("tagline") reinforces the product's timeless appeal. Additional selling points are concisely listed in the "description" text block. The price is prominently displayed in bold lettering via the "price" layer. At the bottom, there's a maroon CTA button ("cta_background") containing white text ("cta") for action prompt.

**Color Palette**:  
- Pale Rose (#F8E1E6)  
- Light Pink (#F8D5DC)  
- Blush Pink (#E9BFC7)  
- Dusty Rose (#E4B0B9)  
- Wine Brown (#8B3A4A)  
- Deep Mauve (#A14253)  
- Rosewood (#733040)  
- Accent Rose (#C56878)  
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases elegant floral-inspired earrings using a delicate and feminine color palette. The dominant color is a soft rose gold (#F4A6A6), used for the structure and outlining, giving it a luxurious and modern appeal. Complementing this is a blush pink (#FAD4D4) in the petal-shaped detail, enhancing the soft and romantic tone. Clear crystals add a touch of brilliance and contrast through bright white highlights (#FFFFFF) and subtle steel gray shadows (#C0C0C0), blending seamlessly with the rose tones. These colors are harmoniously balanced—warmth from the metal tones enriched by the sparkle of the gemstones—ideal for a refined and elegant banner.
